Description: Fragment of oval handle of a pottery transport amphora, moderate turn. Clay near fine, micaceous, red-brown; grey core. Hard fired. Circular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie noted several such stamps in his 1884-5 diary (EES Archive XVII 47).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1332)
